login.subtitle:
SURFsharekit is a repository for materials that are developed within higher education, such as graduation products, research publications and educational materials. By using Sharekit, students, researchers and teachers are able to share these materials with a specific group or with the whole wide world. The latter can be done on various portals such as the HBO Knowledge Base, Narcis and the Search Portal for digital educational materials.

SURFsharekit is a facility from SURF, the collaborative organisation for ICT in Dutch education and research.

start_step.title: Let's share
start_step.text: You are all set! With Sharekit you can easily and quickly store material and make it freely available.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.block_2_subtitle: Easily upload your material and make it freely available.
dashboard.block_3_bullet_1: Access to educational and research results.

empty.title: No publications found
empty.subtitle: Publications that require your attention will become visible here.

report.explanation:
Here you can create an overview of the metadata that are stored in Sharekit, and export it to an Excel file. Choose an organisational unit and / or a publication within a specified period. If you choose to leave all fields empty, all metadata will be exported.

Public downloads are downloads originating from a external portal. Private downloads are downloads originating from an active user on Sharekit.
report.title: Reports

error_pages.page_not_found_subtitle: Oops! We have no idea what happened here!
error_pages.page_not_found_text: It appears this page does not exist. Possible causes could be an outdated bookmark or favorite page, a search engine that points to an outdated page, an incorrectly spelled address or you do not have rights to view this page.
error_pages.page_removed_text: It appears this page has been removed and is now inaccessible.
error_pages.unauthorized_subtitle: Oops! We have no idea what happened here!
error_pages.unauthorized_text: It appears this page does not exist. Possible causes could be an outdated bookmark or favorite page, a search engine that points to an outdated page, an incorrectly spelled address or you do not have rights to view this page.
error_pages.forbidden_subtitle: You are not allowed to view this page
error_pages.forbidden_text: It appears you're trying to access information unavailable to your account, contact your Site Manager to gain permission

tooltips.isni: An ISNI consists of 16 numeric digits, e.g. 0000000115033938
tooltips.dai: A DAI consists of 9 numeric digits, e.g. 123456785
tooltips.orcid: An ORCID consists of 16 numeric digits, divided into 4 blocks separated by a dash, e.g. 0000-0003-0588-8435
